alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 8:20PM CDT until April 26 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, Water over lowest portions of Goos Ferry Road. Cars should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:35 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 2.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:35 PM CDT Thursday was 2.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 2.6 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
